import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import './postShare.css' import profile from '../../img/profile.jpg' import { UilScenery , UilPlayCircle , UilLocationPoint , UilSchedule } from '@iconscout/react-unicons' const PostShare = () => { const[image,setImage] = useState(null) const imageRef = useRef() return (
Photo
Video
Location
Schedule
) } export default PostShare
